text:
URL `POST /api/add`

Add user to project.

Request
```javascript
{
    "token": "CB23C3395153D2414CE7FF22F925776DBF72BF309",        /* Login token */
    "username": "Emil",                   /* Username of the person to be added */
    "project": "time rest"  /* Name of the project where you want to add a user */
}
```
Response success
```javascript
{
    "success": true        /* If the action was successful */
}
```
Response failure
```javascript
{
    "success": false,
    "reason": "User doesn't exist"
}
title: POST add
